string.value: Looks like Jonas fixed the machine... yet it's still cranking out these crazy toys. Maybe he is bonkers. Or maybe he needs some more help.

Looks like Jonas needs help building a new doll, a more perfect likeness of Sophilia. I don't think he realizes she's dead. In any case, I have to collect #b30 Locks of Doll's Hair, 10 Heartstoppers, 10 Maple Candies, and 10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Why the candies? I may never know...
I collected everything Jonas needed to build his new doll in the likeness of his daughter. I have to say though... it looks nothing like her.

Thanks to you, the Prendergast Toy Company is back on track! The machine is fixed and everything is ship shape now.\r\n\r\n#L0##bThe machine's fixed?! But... it's still making these crazy homicidal toys!#l#k

Toys? There's nothing wrong with my toys. No, no, the broken Assembler was merely slowing down production, that's all. Now that my we're back to full production, I can turn my attention back to the task at hand... finishing the newest model of my line of dolls! Perhaps you've seen them... yes, I'm sure you have! They're modeled after my daughter! This latest doll is almost a perfect likeness of her. Which reminds me, I'll need some help in finishing it. Lend a hand?

#L0##bI guess this can't get any worse... I'll help you build your doll.#l#k
#L1##bYou're crazy! I'm not helping you build any more crazy dolls!#l#k
Ok now! Do you have your pen and paper ready?

But what about the children? They will be so disappointed if I do not make more of my dolls. Have you no heart? If you're not going to help me, I shall carry on by myself. Yes, yes... for the children...

#b30 Locks of Doll's Hair#k should do the trick. Hmm... but where? Perhaps Edmunds may know where to find more. Or maybe you can get some back from my older models! Yes, yes, it's worth the sacrifice. Oh, and I'll also need some candy. Why, you ask? Tsk, tsk, that's the Prendergast secret, and part of the magic of my toymaking! Bring me #b10 Heartstoppers#k, #b10 Maple Candies#k, and #b10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Doll's hair and candy. Run along now. Time's a wastin'!
What about the children? They will be so disappointed if I do not make more of my dolls. Have you no heart? If you're not going to help me, I shall carry on by myself. Yes, yes... for the children...

Wonderfully done! You're becoming as helpful as Edmunds. Give me a second while I finish the doll. Now, I just need to attach this... then, just a nudge here... and a stitch there... And loop this around three times... There, it's PERFECT!

Here, take this to Sophilia! Tell my darling it's a gift from her Papa. I can't wait to see the joy on my daughter's face when she sees this! Run along! Do find her quickly! Marvelous how this one turned out! It's an absolutely perfect likeness of her! Absolutely PERFECT! I shall have to set up another production line for this model quickly!

If you haven't collected all the requirements No, no, no, no, no... this is not good at all! #b30 Locks of Doll's Hair#k is what I need... and not a strand less. Now, I certainly can't make a bald doll or a doll with only half a head full of hair, can I? No, no! Then what would my daughter think if I told her I made this doll to look like her? And don't forget the sweets! #b10 Heartstoppers, 10 Maple Candies, and 10 Pumpkin Taffies#k. Do you know how sweet my dear Sophilia is? How am I going to make a doll in her likeness if I don't have candy to eat while I work?
Hey! You shouldn't lose something this important! I found my doll getting harmed by other dolls of my creation!
Here you go. You MUST give this to Sophilia right away. Don't play around with it!
